INVALID_AUTH: You are not authorized to use the API
CANNOT_EDIT_THE_BOT: Cannot edit the bot, some error was ocurred
MISSING_ID_PROPERTY: Cannot edit a bot without `_id` property
CANNOT_CREATE_THE_BOT: Cannot create the bot, some error was ocurred
BOT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Cannot add a bot that already exists
SOME_PROPERTIES_IS_MISSING: Some properties is missing to add a bot
